page.title: 20Likes and dislikes
page.content:
I asked the children in our class what they liked and disliked about living in this area. Most of the children like living here.They like the peacefulness and fresh air of the countryside and living near the beaches.They can play in the fields. Many children like the school dinners. We have things like meat pie, chips, roast chicken,custard eclairs, meringues. A lot of children do not like the holidaymakers in the area because they think they drive around much too fast.They nickname them "emmets" which means ants.Some children do not like the smells from the farmyards and some children have no dislikes at all.
Written by Grade Ruan Primary School.
